entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 gusting to 70 near Haro Strait late this evening and overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 gusting to 70 near Haro Strait early in the morning. Wind becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023
